Keyword_Questions.Keyword: What is a keyword or term used in MAIDS that you believe would be helpful to describe the keyword?
Keyword_Questions.Definition: What is the definition of the keyword?
Keyword_Questions.Link: What is the link to online material further discussing of the keyword?

Keyword_1.Definition: IndoCyanine Green. Flourescent Dye approved for human usage

Keyword_2.Definition: ICG-Flourescence Angiography. i.e. vizualization of blood vessels using ICG flourescence

Keyword_3.Definition: Quantitative ICG. The name of the algorithm create by project group. Refers

Keyword_4.Definition: Flourescence Enhanced Reality. Similar algorithm to QICG, different group of researchers

Keyword_8.Definition: the union of parts or branches so as to intercommunicate or interconnect

Keyword_9.Definition: Any assessment of blood flow to organ or region. Adjectives determines context. E.g. quantitative or visual
